attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence In the Current Labour Government
attributes.additional_details:
It is the Governments job to protect its citizens and look after their Welfare. There are many reasons why I believe this Labour Government is not doing that. Each Citizen signing this petition will have their own reasons. Mine is they are not representing me or keeping my country and its Citizens safe as I believe my Government should. 
This Government is not putting British Citizens first.
attributes.background: I want the Government to stand down as I do not believe they are representing the British people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
